room_title: Escape room "The Masterpiece" by Enigma Escape Rooms in Buffalo
room_description: Billionaire investor and art collector James A Wright III has died without an heir. An audit of his estate reveals that nearly $900 million of his fortune is missing. His butler Benedict has been cut out of the will so he has hired you, a crack team of thieves, to break into Mr Wright’s Manhattan office the night before the auction and escape the room with Wright’s missing fortune.
